denial_patterns.description: Procedure requires prior authorization but none documented
denial_patterns.recommendation: Obtain prior authorization from payer before scheduling procedure.

denial_patterns.description: Diagnosis codes do not clinically support the requested procedure
denial_patterns.recommendation: Ensure ICD-10 codes directly support medical necessity of the procedure.

denial_patterns.description: Clinical documentation does not establish medical necessity
denial_patterns.recommendation: Document clinical necessity with supporting evidence from patient chart.

denial_patterns.description: Required clinical documentation fields are missing or incomplete
denial_patterns.recommendation: Complete all required documentation fields before claim submission.

denial_patterns.description: Prescribed medication conflicts with documented patient allergy
denial_patterns.recommendation: Resolve allergy conflict before prescribing. Document clinical rationale if override is medically justified.

denial_patterns.description: HIGH or CONTRAINDICATED drug interaction detected in current medications
denial_patterns.recommendation: Review medication combination with prescribing physician. Document clinical justification before claim submission.

denial_patterns.description: Service or medication may not be covered under the patient's plan
denial_patterns.recommendation: Verify coverage with payer prior to service. Consider alternative covered options.

denial_patterns.description: Patient may have multiple active insurance plans requiring coordination
denial_patterns.recommendation: Verify primary payer and bill in correct coordination of benefits order.
